41 
42 // Range1D class used for representing a range of positive integers.
43 // Its primary usage is in accessing vectors and matrices by subregions
44 // of rows and columns
45 //
46 
47 #ifndef TEUCHOS_RANGE1D_HPP
48 #define TEUCHOS_RANGE1D_HPP
49 
54 #include "Teuchos_ScalarTraits.hpp"
55 #include "Teuchos_Assert.hpp"
56 
57 namespace Teuchos {
58 
87 class Range1D {
88 public:
89 
91  typedef Teuchos_Ordinal Index;
92 
94  typedef Teuchos_Ordinal Ordinal;
95 
97  enum EInvalidRange { INVALID };
98 
100  static const Range1D Invalid;
101 
111  inline Range1D();
112 
122  inline Range1D( EInvalidRange );
123 
138  inline Range1D(Ordinal lbound, Ordinal ubound);
139 
143  inline bool full_range() const;
144 
146  inline Ordinal lbound() const;
147 
149  inline Ordinal ubound() const;
150 
152  inline Ordinal size() const;
153 
155  inline bool in_range(Ordinal i) const;
156 
158  inline Range1D& operator+=( Ordinal incr );
159 
161  inline Range1D& operator-=( Ordinal incr );
162 
163 private:
164  Ordinal lbound_;
165  Ordinal ubound_; // = INT_MAX-1 flag for entire range
166  // lbound == ubound == 0 flag for invalid range.
167 
168  // assert that the range is valid
169  inline void assert_valid_range(Ordinal lbound, Ordinal ubound) const;
170 
171 }; // end class Range1D
172 
179 inline bool operator==(const Range1D& rng1, const Range1D& rng2 )
180 {
181  return rng1.lbound() == rng2.lbound() && rng1.ubound() == rng2.ubound();
182 }
183 
195 inline Range1D operator+(const Range1D &rng_rhs, Range1D::Ordinal i)
196 {
197  return Range1D(i+rng_rhs.lbound(), i+rng_rhs.ubound());
198 }
199 
211 inline Range1D operator+(Range1D::Ordinal i, const Range1D &rng_rhs)
212 {
213  return Range1D(i+rng_rhs.lbound(), i+rng_rhs.ubound());
214 }
215 
227 inline Range1D operator-(const Range1D &rng_rhs, Range1D::Ordinal i)
228 {
229  return Range1D(rng_rhs.lbound()-i, rng_rhs.ubound()-i);
230 }
231 
247 inline Range1D full_range(const Range1D &rng, Range1D::Ordinal lbound, Range1D::Ordinal ubound)
248 { return rng.full_range() ? Range1D(lbound,ubound) : rng; }
249 
250 // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
251 // Inline members
252 
253 inline
254 Range1D::Range1D()
255  : lbound_(0), ubound_(INT_MAX-1)
256 {}
257 
258 inline
259 Range1D::Range1D( EInvalidRange )
260  : lbound_(0), ubound_(-1)
261 {}
262 
263 
264 inline
265 Range1D::Range1D(Ordinal lbound_in, Ordinal ubound_in)
266  : lbound_(lbound_in), ubound_(ubound_in)
267 {
268  assert_valid_range(lbound_in,ubound_in);
269 }
270 
271 inline
272 bool Range1D::full_range() const {
273  return ubound_ == INT_MAX-1;
274 }
275 
276 inline
277 Range1D::Ordinal Range1D::lbound() const {
278  return lbound_;
279 }
280 
281 inline
282 Range1D::Ordinal Range1D::ubound() const {
283  return ubound_;
284 }
285 
286 inline
287 Range1D::Ordinal Range1D::size() const {
288  return ubound_ - lbound_ + 1;
289 }
290 
291 inline
292 bool Range1D::in_range(Ordinal i) const {
293  return lbound_ <= i && i <= ubound_;
294 }
295 
296 inline
297 Range1D& Range1D::operator+=( Ordinal incr ) {
298  assert_valid_range( lbound_ + incr, ubound_ + incr );
299  lbound_ += incr;
300  ubound_ += incr;
301  return *this;
302 }
303 
304 inline
305 Range1D& Range1D::operator-=( Ordinal incr )
306 {
307  assert_valid_range( lbound_ - incr, ubound_ - incr );
308  lbound_ -= incr;
309  ubound_ -= incr;
310  return *this;
311 }
312 
313 
314 // See Range1D.cpp
315 inline
316 void Range1D::assert_valid_range(Ordinal lbound_in, Ordinal ubound_in) const
317 {
318  (void)lbound_in; (void)ubound_in;
319 #ifdef TEUCHOS_DEBUG
320  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
321  lbound_in < 0, std::range_error
322  ,"Range1D::assert_valid_range(): Error, lbound ="
323  <<lbound_in<<" must be greater than or equal to 0."
324  );
325  TEUCHOS_TEST_FOR_EXCEPTION(
326  lbound_in > ubound_in, std::range_error
327  ,"Range1D::assert_valid_range(): Error, lbound = "
328  <<lbound_in<<" > ubound = "<<ubound_in
329  );
330 #endif
331 }
332 
333 } // end namespace Teuchos
